item.description:
We'll do something SPECIAL for May's brunch to welcome Spring.

We'll go to Independence Harbor in Assonet on MAY 2. This is the FIRST Sunday of the month (instead of our usual 3rd Sunday)

Independence Harbor is a 20 acre private estate used exclusively for weddings but, on the 1st Sunday of each month, they have a public brunch.

The facility and the menu look FABULOUS.

This is a $19.95 per person buffet.

Here's the website info:

http://www.ihweddings...

I've spoken with the facility and they will accept a reservation beginning on April 3rd. To be sure we get the time and seating we want, I'm going to book our reservation on or close to that date. Please RSVP by April 3rd if you can for this brunch meetup.

Thanks
item.name: May Brunch - Independence Harbor in Assonet MA
